title: Lava Beds National Monument: Materials to Loan
body: Materials to Loan      Planning on spending a day in the park? Lava Beds has materials available for loan that will help you and your students get the most out of your visit. Also check out our Traveling Trunks to bring the park to your classroom.        Results   Showing results 1-3 of 3    Sort By:  Title Date         Lava Beds National Monument Binoculars   Want a good look at Lava Beds?  We have binoculars available to help your class get up close views of wildlife, geologic features, and much more.    Type:Media For Loan Grade level:General Subjects:Biology: Animals, Ecology, Geography, Geology        Lava Beds National Monument Clipboards   We have clipboards for loan so that you can take your classes into the field.    Type:Media For Loan        Lava Beds National Monument Flashlights   It’s hard to explore caves in the dark, so if you hope to visit any caves other than Mushpot we recommend that you have a flashlight for each student.     Type:Media For Loan Subjects:Geology
